title: Understanding Sheet Tab Customization
text: To change the name of a sheet tab, you need to interact with the tab directly. Think about how you usually rename files or folders on your computer.

title: Changing the Sheet Tab Name
text: To rename a sheet tab, try double-clicking on the tab. This action usually allows you to edit the name directly.

title: Changing the Sheet Tab Color
text: To change the color of a sheet tab, consider using the right-click menu. This menu often provides options for customization, including color changes.

hintAnswer: $$Double-click$$ the sheet tab and enter the name;right click the sheet tab to change the color
title: Steps to Change Sheet Tab Name and Color
text: Follow these steps to change the sheet tab name and color: $$1$$. Double-click the sheet tab to enter the new name. $$2$$. Right-click the sheet tab to access the color options and select your desired color.
choices: $$Double-click$$ the sheet tab and enter the name;right click the sheet tab to change the color
Right click the sheet tab and enter the name;double click the sheet tab to change the color
